revised_title: John Theodore Cash: A Life in Medicine and Science
tldr: John Theodore Cash was a prominent figure in the field of medicine and science, with a focus on pharmacology and physiology. He held various positions in academia and contributed significantly to the development of medical research and education. His work spanned a wide range of topics, from the study of chemical constitution and physiological action to the investigation of the larynx and intestinal function. Cash was also an avid angler and a dedicated scientist throughout his life.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Medical History
